data.title: Justin Timberlake Shares Pics With Wife Jessica Biel After Night Out In Las Vegas
data.meta_description: Justin Timberlake and Jessica Biel enjoyed a night out in Las Vegas! Here's a timeline of their relationship.
data.text:
Justin Timberlake knows that when it comes to his wife, actor Jessica Biel, he has big shoes to fill.

On Dec. 14, the â€œCry Me a River" singer shared a post about the "7th Heaven" star on Instagram.

"I could never walk a mile in her shoes but, you know itâ€™s been a good night when Iâ€™m carrying the heels home," he captioned the post, which featured two photos of the couple. Timberlake and Biel attended the opening of the Fontainebleau Hotel in Las Vegas on Dec. 13, where he also performed.

Both pictures show the married couple dressed up and their backs to the camera as they walk down a hotel hallway. Biel can be seen wearing a flowing cream dress and holding a clutch in her hand. Still, it's Timberlake, dressed in a black suit, carrying her heels.

"Gorgeous photo!!!" one user wrote in the comments section of the post.

"You guys are the ABSOLUTE CUTEST!!!!" another replied. "No argument!!!!!"

Timberlake and Biel tied the knot in 2012, and they share two sons, Silas, 8, and Phineas, 3.

They may have recently celebrated their 11th anniversary, but their love story began years before they said, "I do."

Hereâ€™s what to know about Justin Timberlake and Jessica Bielâ€™s relationship timeline.

Timberlake sensed there was 'just something about' Biel from the moment they met

Timberlake recalled his instant attraction to Biel in his 2018 book, â€œHindsight & All The Things I Canâ€™t See In Front Of Me.â€

â€œWhen I met Jess, it was undeniable how beautiful she is,â€ Timberlake wrote in an excerpt shared by Entertainment Weekly ahead of the book's release. â€œWe were at a surprise party in Hollywood at a speakeasy kind of a bar, a private club, and we were standing around in a group of people."

He added that he "made some sort of sarcastic comment, really dry."

"Nobody got it except her," he said. "She laughed, and I noticed, all of a sudden, and in the way where you wonder if a personâ€™s like you, if they have a very dry, dark sense of humor, too.â€

He said he and Biel didnâ€™t exchange phone numbers that evening, but that he found himself thinking about her after they parted.

â€œThoughts kept leaping into my mind: Iâ€™m kind of really interested in that girl,â€ he wrote in his book. â€œThere was just something about that girl.â€

Romance eventually bloomed between them when Biel came to one of his shows, and he gave her and her friends a ride in his tour bus.

â€œThat was when we started talking on the phone,â€ Timberlake wrote. â€œWe didnâ€™t date at first. For about two weeks, we talked on the phone, because I was on tour.â€

In 2007, they appeared to go public with their relationship. In January that year, they were spotted snowboarding together, and in October 2007 they attended a Green Bay Packers-Chicago Bears game together in Green Bay, Wisconsin.

They kept their early relationship private

By 2009, the pair had confirmed they were together, but they mostly kept the details of their relationship away from the public eye.

Biel called the media attention around their relationship â€œweird and sort of bizarre to deal withâ€ in a 2009 interview with the U.K.'s The Independent.

â€œYou have to have a sense of humor about the whole thing," she said. "Honestly, I look at a magazine and they know more than I do."

She told Vogue in a 2010 story she didnâ€™t â€œwant to talkâ€ about her relationship with Timberlake.

â€œI donâ€™t feel the need to clear anything up. Itâ€™s the most precious thing that I have in my life, and I care about it so much that I donâ€™t care about what anyone says or thinks,â€ she said. â€œI have just not addressed it in any real way, and Iâ€™m not going to. Itâ€™s mine. And I really like that about it.â€

They briefly split in 2011

Biel and Timberlake separated for several months in 2011.

â€œAddressing the media speculation regarding Jessica Biel and Justin Timberlakeâ€™s relationship, we are confirming that they mutually have decided to part ways,â€ their reps confirmed in a statement to People in March 2011. â€œThe two remain friends and continue to hold the highest level of love and respect for each other.â€

By the end of 2011, however, they were back together.

Biel said she had no idea Timberlakeâ€™s marriage proposal was coming

Timberlake popped the question to Biel in December 2011 in an unlikely setting.

â€œWe were in Montana on a piece of property that we owned at the time. We had snowboarded all day. It was in the middle of the winter. Waist-high snow,â€ Biel recalled on â€œThe Late Late Show with James Cordenâ€ in May 2022. â€œWe were (in) head-to-toe snowboarding outfits, hats, gloves, everything."

â€œAnd, all of a sudden, he gets down onto his knees and just sinks into the snow,â€ she continued. â€œAnd then he looks up at me and pulls out this ring.â€

Biel described the proposal as â€œlovely,â€ â€œsurprisingâ€ and â€œhilarious.â€

They tied the knot in 2012

Biel and Timberlake got married in southern Italy on Oct. 19, 2012.

Their wedding, which Biel described to People as a â€œtotal fantasy experience,â€ included plenty of sweet moments â€” including when Timberlake serenaded Biel as she walked down the aisle.

â€œIt was an original piece I wrote specifically for the evening and for her,â€ he told People.

They invited 100 guests to their wedding, according to People, including Jimmy Fallon, Andy Samberg and Timbaland.

Biel opted against a traditional white gown, choosing instead a stunning, pale pink organza wedding dress by Italian designer Giambattista Valli.

The couple welcomed their first son in 2015

Timberlake and Biel welcomed their first child, Silas Randall Timberlake, on April 8, 2015.

Biel opened up about being a first-time parent on TODAY in October 2015, calling it an â€œamazing, amazing experienceâ€ but also â€œthe hardest job in the world.â€

â€œIâ€™ve never been more thankful and grateful to my own mother,â€ she said. â€œOh, my gosh, Iâ€™m going to call her right after this actually and just thank her. What you have to do for your kid â€” itâ€™s an amazing responsibility and the biggest joy ever.â€

In a sweet Fatherâ€™s Day Instagram post in 2018, Timberlake reflected on being a dad to Silas.

â€œThe last 3 years of my life have brought more joy than I could ever imagine. Being a father is such a trip... an amazing discovery every day,â€ he wrote in the caption, in part.

â€œMy son: it is my honor to be your Daddy. You make me feel a love that I didnâ€™t know existed," his post continued. "I will ALWAYS be there... to pick you up when you fall, to lift you up when you are ready to soar, and to remind you that your humility will be your guide through this thing called life.â€

Biel revealed in a 2017 interview on â€œThe Tonight Showâ€ that although Silas was still a toddler at the time, he was already channeling Timberlakeâ€™s style.

â€œ(Heâ€™s) kind of like a mini-Justin,â€ she said of Silas. â€œItâ€™s his style. Heâ€™s got, like, a daddy swagger. You know what I mean?â€

In 2019, Timberlake issued a public apology about a 'strong lapse in judgement'

In late 2019, tabloid photos emerged of Timberlake holding hands with actor Alisha Wainwright, his co-star in the movie â€œPalmer.â€

Amid media speculation around the photos, Timberlake shared a statement on Instagram.

â€œI stay away from gossip as much as I can, but for my family I feel it is important to address recent rumors that are hurting the people I love,â€ his post began. â€œA few weeks ago I displayed a strong lapse in judgement â€” but let me be clear â€” nothing happened between me and my costar. I drank way too much that night and I regret my behavior. I should have known better.â€

His statement continued, â€œI apologize to my amazing wife and family for putting them through such an embarrassing situation, and I am focused on being the best husband and father I can be.â€

The couple welcomed their second son, Phineas, in 2020

Biel and Timberlake welcomed their second child, Phineas, in the summer of 2020, but didnâ€™t share the news publicly until much later.

â€œI had, like, a secret COVID baby,â€ Biel joked to Dax Shepard on the â€œArmchair Expertâ€ podcast in 2021.

â€œIt wasnâ€™t like it was supposed to be a secret,â€ she continued. â€œIt was just COVID happened, and then I went to Montana with my family and never left,â€ she added.

Timberlake confirmed the new addition to their family and revealed Phineasâ€™ name in a January 2021 interview on â€œThe Ellen DeGeneres Show.â€

â€œHeâ€™s awesome and heâ€™s so cute ... and nobodyâ€™s sleeping,â€ Timberlake said. â€œWeâ€™re thrilled and couldnâ€™t be happier.â€

Timberlake shared the first public photo of Phineas, keeping his sonâ€™s face obscured, in a 2021 Fatherâ€™s Day Instagram post.

â€œBeing a dad is better than I ever could have imagined,â€ he wrote in the caption. â€œThankful to my dads and my grandfathers for leading the way, making the sacrifices for me to live out my dreams, and for teaching me that REAL LIFE happens in all the little moments. Happy Fatherâ€™s Day to all the dads out there!!!â€

The following Fatherâ€™s Day, Timberlake shared an adorable photo of his sons sitting on a piano bench.

â€œMy two favorite melodies,â€ he wrote in the caption.

They have opened up about one way they keep their relationship fresh

Though they have been married for more than a decade, Biel has said that they still go out on dates with each other.

â€œJustin always says, he goes, â€˜We cannot stop dating. We have to keep dating.â€™ Thatâ€™s always what he says, and heâ€™s right,â€ Biel said on TODAY with Hoda & Jenna in November 2022.

She also said their relationship is based on a foundation of safety that still allows for growth and curiosity.

â€œIt feels so, I donâ€™t know, a combination of incredibly safe and, I guess, just deep understanding of another person,â€ she said. â€œBut then also â€¦ the safety to adventure again and sort of be curious about the world, again, as a couple and as individuals. I mean, you have to keep working hard to make it fresh.â€

They renewed their vows in 2022

As they marked 10 years of marriage, Biel and Timberlake renewed their vows in an intimate ceremony in 2022.

Although a vow renewal â€œsounds (like a) big deal â€¦ it was not,â€ Biel said on TODAY with Hoda & Jenna in November 2022.

â€œIt was very intimate, it was very small,â€ she said. â€œA couple of our friends, and we literally barely put this thing together. We almost canceled it. We thought, â€˜Oh, is this silly? Are we going to feel goofy doing this?â€™ And, actually, it was so moving. I felt like, â€˜Wow, weâ€™re really kind of, weâ€™re going to keep doing this. Look at us.â€™ It felt really nice.â€

They share a playful sense of humor

Another secret to Biel and Timberlakeâ€™s strong bond is no doubt their sense of humor.

Earlier this year, Biel delivered a pitch-perfect response to a meme involving her and her husband.

It all started when a social media user mistook Biel for Timberlakeâ€™s girlfriend.

â€œI donâ€™t know who you are but your girlfriend looks like Jessica Biel. Congrats!â€ the user wrote to Timberlake.

Biel responded with a selfie of her and Timberlake on Instagram in May 2023 with the caption, â€œMy boyfriend.â€

â€œI know this sounds crazy but, will you marry me?â€ Timberlake commented on his wifeâ€™s post with a heart-eyes emoji.

Earlier this year, Biel also shared a cute video of Timberlake distracting her with his dance moves during a workout.

In a post for Timberlakeâ€™s birthday last January, Biel celebrated her husbandâ€™s sense of humor.

â€œHappy birthday to the person who challenges and inspires me every day. The person who keeps me laughing and creating and risking it all,â€ she wrote on Jan. 31. â€œThe person who makes the ordinary extraordinary. You know who you are. I love you.â€

Timberlake calls Biel a 'DREAM' of a partner

Timberlake, 42, opened up about his enduring love for Biel, 41, in an Instagram post celebrating her birthday earlier this year, calling her â€œthe most badass, most graceful, most gorgeous DREAM of a partner I could have ever wished for.â€

â€œIâ€™m so glad you were born, my love,â€ he continued. â€œAnd, Iâ€™m so lucky that you are choosing to do this thing called life with me. Aging like a FINEğŸ·!!!! I love you to the moon and back.â€
